title: ''YOUR SHOP'' CHANGED FOR ME WTFFF
body: so you know ''your shop'' where you get discounts for skins ? so I checked it yesterday and I got pretty good skins so I was planning to get 3. today comes I log on and I go to ''your shop'' and I see the skins flipped over so I click on all of them and I have different skin ??? WTFFFFF I was planning to get 3 of them but it changed WTF riot

replies.body: Same thing happened to me.. bye my championship zed and primal udyr :(

There was a bit of an issue with the shop when it first came up, so we needed to take it down in order to apply the fix. After it relaunched, most people had different offers. Not a big deal though, hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we should be able to help as long as you did open them the first time.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ZEdoOGmN,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-09-19T21:07:07.817+0000)
>
> There was a bit of an issue with the shop when it first came up, so we needed to take it down in order to apply the fix. After it relaunched, most people had different offers. Not a big deal though, hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we should be able to help as long as you did open them the first time.

ty
Same thing happened to me, would have got 2 skins now i don't want any of them
